text: Tridrepana postica is a moth in the family Drepanidae. It was described by Moore in 1879. It is found in north-eastern India and Malaysia. The wingspan is about 27.4-37.4 mm for males and 35.8-40.2 mm for females. ==References== Category:Moths described in 1879 Category:Drepaninae
title: Tridrepana postica
